article: The earth moves round the sun, and the moon moves round the earth. When our part of the earth turns  _  the sun, it is day. When our part of the earth runs away  _  the sun, it is  _  . The sun is much  _  than the moon. But sometimes the moon  _  bigger than the sun, because it's much  _  to the earth. The sun is very bright. It gives very  _  light. The moon looks quite bright, too, but it doesn't give any light at all. The light  _  the moon comes from the sun. The moon looks much bigger and brighter than the stars,  _  in fact the stars are much bigger and brighter than the moon.  They look  smaller than the moon because they are farther away from the earth.
